marklogic.body:
Wow is right - they ... that is, she ... are ... that is, is ... spectacular.Â It's all downhill for her from here on, baby!Â
(Oh - that's actually true, isn't it? Next, she passes out of the God-dess stage; guest-flashes Letterman; gets caught having done a yuteful, pardon my French, diffusion, on Penthouse that'd make the Virginia legislature Blush; gets cast as a wiggle-on in the latest Will Ferrell spoof; flies to Cannes for the Film Festival only to get outed by Murdoch's Sun in an exposee featuring grainy pictures implying her showing up as a Lady Gaga impersonator at a Berlusconi bunga bunga hoedown on a private island theÂ CÃ´te d'Azur;Â gets caught on video doing the horizontal mambo in a cab with some C-list girl-toy band drummer, fresh trampstamp-side up;Â starts a new gig celeb pitching Abshakers on the HSN;Â endorses "Rick Romney" for president while on a Santorum Sweater Girl promo; confesses her favorite lyrics are the opening lines to Amy Winehouse's Back to Black; gets caught by the paparazzi driving up to the side gate of the Betty Ford Center claiming she & her friend got "lost looking for the turn-Off to Napa Valley"; marries & divorces the latest country music bad boy all within the same fortnight of living dangerously; campaigns for her Uncle Fred; gets trashed in a NYT feature analysing the GOP's downfall as tracking to the "Bimbo Factor"; does a turn on the Wingnut Welfare Celeb Circuit; closes out the year in pre-promotion of a porn parody, Behind the Red Door.)
